title.rendered: AFN REAR STEP BAR TO SUIT MITSUBISHI TRITON MQ 2015+

content.rendered:
AFN Rear Step Bar to suit Mitsubishi Triton MQ (2015+), available now through Automax 4×4!

AFN rear step bar to suit Mitsubishi Triton MQ (2015+) includes;

  • Side Protection
  • Built-in Towbar
  • Aluminum Checkered Plate Step Cover
  • Rated Recovery Points
  • Hi-Lift Jack Points
  • Matte Black Powder Coated

To check out our full range of accessories for your Mitsubishi Triton, click here!

For more 4×4 inspiration follow us on Instagram and Facebook

excerpt.rendered: AFN rear step bar to suit your Mitsubishi Triton MQ (2015+ models) are currently available through Automax 4×4!
